plot: Rick and Jerry's minds are accidentally scrambled; they have to learn to set aside their differences to save their family.

While trying to teach Jerry a lesson, Rick switches their minds and bodies around. Things go wrong, and their minds are scrambled with each other. From trying to kill each other to best friends, they cause mayhem around the galaxy. But not everything goes to plan, as they have to make tough decisions to chose between their new happiness and their family.
